attributes.action: Travel consumer experts in the media must come with a 'health warning'.
attributes.additional_details: E.g.  - Ravi Rajani on ITV's Lorraine did not warn of the financial risk when booking travel separately.
attributes.background: The advice given by travel consumer experts in the media usually misses out important facts. Missing these facts could put people's holidays at risk. All advice should come with a written or verbal warning of the risks to following the advice. Just like the 'small print' at the end of radio ads.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. This petition seems to be calling on broadcasters, not the Government or Parliament, to take this action.
